New Records: Sybrand Engelbrecht and Logan van Beek set a 130-run record for the seventh wicket in the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023
Key Match Events: Aryan Dutt's bowling led to key dismissals in the Powerplay
Sybrand Engelbrecht's performance helped Netherlands recover
Sri Lanka's chase was supported by partnerships from Sadeera Samarawickrama and Charith Asalanka
Pre-Game Insights: Netherlands carried momentum from their previous win over South Africa
Sri Lanka aimed to end their winless streak in the tournament
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka coach Anton Roux acknowledged Netherlands' strengths post-match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka secured their first win in the World Cup 2023
The match was played at BRSABVE Cricket Stadium
